### 6. Environment Variables ‚ö†Ô∏è WARNING
```

‚ö†Ô∏è JWT_SECRET_KEY: Missing (using default)
```
**Status:** Core variables set, JWT using default  
**Action:** Set JWT_SECRET_KEY before production deployment  
**Impact:** Medium - Authentication works but security could be improved

**Fix:**
```bash
cd /app/backend
echo 'JWT_SECRET_KEY="your-secure-random-key-here"' >> .env
```

## ‚ö†Ô∏è WARNINGS (Non-Critical)

### 1. JWT Secret Key Not Set
**Severity:** Medium  
**Impact:** Authentication works but uses default secret  
**Fix Time:** 1 minute  
**Blocking:** No  
**Recommendation:** Set before public launch

### 2. Learn English Lessons Limited
**Severity:** Low  
**Impact:** Only 8 lessons vs 34 for Learn Thai  
**Fix Time:** 4-6 hours  
**Blocking:** No  
**Recommendation:** Mirror lessons in Phase 2

**Severity:** Very Low  
**Impact:** Health check text search limitation (false negative)  
**Fix Time:** N/A (expected behavior)

**Recommendation:** None - working as designed

- JWT using default secret
- Limited Learn English content

**Recommendation:** **DEPLOY** with documented limitations

- Still has Phase 2 items

## üåç DEPLOYMENT PLATFORMS

### Web Deployment (Current) ‚úÖ
- **Platform:** Expo Web
- **Status:** Fully functional
- **URL:** http://localhost:3000
- **Ready:** Yes

### Mobile Deployment (Recommended)
- **iOS:** Ready for EAS build
- **Android:** Ready for EAS build
- **Commands:**
```bash
cd /app/frontend
eas build --platform ios
eas build --platform android
```

### Backend Deployment Options
- **Docker:** Ready (already containerized)
- **Kubernetes:** Compatible
- **Heroku:** Compatible
- **AWS/GCP:** Ready
- **DigitalOcean:** Ready

---

## üìù DEPLOYMENT COMMANDS

### Backend Deployment
```bash
cd /app/backend
pip install -r requirements.txt
uvicorn server:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8001 --reload
```

### Frontend Deployment (Web)
```bash
cd /app/frontend
yarn install
expo start --web
```

### Frontend Deployment (Mobile)
```bash
cd /app/frontend
eas build --platform all
eas submit --platform all
```

### Docker Deployment
```bash
cd /app
docker-compose up -d
```
